• Stood 3rd in Android App Development competition held at Parul University.

 • Secured 32nd position in Speech Master 2, a state level speaking competition at Parul University.

 • Participated in the state level competition of Speed Skating.
Instructing students in C language programming from the batch of 2021 to 2025. Developed and delivered engaging lessons to facilitate comprehension and mastery of foundational programming concepts.
Contributed to the Sales and Marketing team by effectively implementing strategies to generate revenue. Achieved a sales figure of 1.75L through various marketing initiatives and sales efforts.
